items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a sweater dress
items.body: Not a sweater dress, it's more like a bodycon material, not comfy, not cute, don't waste your time or money Read more
items.author: The McKs

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty but too large!
items.body: Beware: the dress is pretty but somewhat large, so I returned it. The problem is that Amazon issued me a refund, but it never went back to my Chase Prime Credit Card. This is the third item that I have to dispute to get a refund with my prime card. Double check that you got your refund back! Read more
items.author: Marcela Burgess

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Heads up
items.body: This dress is super cute This review is just as a "warning" to anyone who's got a little more of a bust. Because of my chest size the cinched in area ended up being right under my boobs, not at my waist. Which completely changed the shape to be an empire waist instead of an hour glass. Read more
items.author: Andie

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars False advertisement
items.body: Nothing like the picture. Absolutely awful and itchy material. Thats why I returned it Read more
items.author: Tabitha Morris

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute
items.body: This is a decent quality. Itâ€™s nice and soft and itâ€™s true to size. This dress is super cute and can be worn to the office or even if you want a more dressier look.The color is just like the picture and I recommend washing/ drying on the delicate cycle . Read more
items.author: Ashley

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute, but I wanted more from it
items.body: I'm a sweater-weather girly, and have lately developed a love for dresses as well, so this seemed like an awesome thing to try. Normally sweater dresses are pencil dresses, which can be sometimes pretty unflattering on any stomach that is less than flat. So I was excited to try this one and see if it broke that mold! The Good: â€¢Color is exactly as pictured - a nice, rich black. â€¢The material is soft, and I don't find it itchy. â€¢The weave pattern is cute and didn't have any loose threads. â€¢Arm length is generous, and the skirt is also a decent length - although most of us would likely wear tights or leggings with it anyway. The Bad: â€¢This length always makes me want pockets, and of course there are none. â€¢Honestly, for the style, I guess I thought it would be more flattering? It hits my waist at the right part but still feels like it makes me look wider than I am. â€¢The biggest issue: The yarn used is too thin for you to wear this without a tank top and leggings or something similar underneath it unless you want to give everyone a show. The arms are fine, but any stretch at all and it's showing off your bra or whatever else through the knit holes. The Takeaway: If I tried this on in the store before buying it, I wouldn't buy it at all. Because I already have it now, I'll try to see if I can make it work. Maybe adding a belt could work. But I'm disappointed that it isn't more flattering and that it's basically see-through, even though the sleeves are comfy and the length is nice. Read more
items.author: Emilie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Khaki, Burgundy, Black, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
